column5: Just wondering if anybody has been fishin out that way this fall? Im going there for a couple of days.... just wondering whats happening out that way. Hopefully this cooler weather has brought in some fish. I will be throwing plugs and spoons at them..  thanks for the replys guys..

fish the big pool below the falls (not in the sanctuary ,LOL)....should be loaded with chinny's..If your gonna fish spoons. Fish glow in the dark spoons at night....Or else drift spawn first thing in the morning..
Thanks for the info... we usually fish roe a few feet off bottom at night, but plugs and spoons seem to be the trick in the evening at dusk.
